info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:48PM EDT until August 03 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT/530 PM EDT/ FOR SOUTHERN IROQUOIS...SOUTHERN NEWTON AND WESTERN BENTON COUNTIES... At 348 PM CDT/448 PM EDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rensselaer to near Hoopeston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watseka, Fowler, Kentland, Milford, Morocco, Sheldon, Goodland, Brook, Cissna Park, Buckley, Earl Park, Stockland, Woodland, Wellington, Ambia, Iroquois, Mount Ayr, Dunnington, Wadena and Claytonville. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 273 and 275. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
